name: Hellish Job
description:
So today is your first day, huh? Welcome, welcome, buddy, make yourself at home. You will surely like it here. Everyone likes this place, can't you see? This little job for you will be hella fun. I promise. You can ask anyone, they'd approve it. Oh, just don't drop that lil pebble and everything should be alright.

Oh, by the way, say hello to our last employees of the month:

The Boss - Oleg Bone 

The Artist - satacat

The Coder(s) - Dozer_stone and Arikaton

The Meme - robri

Made for LD47: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/$223785
